	Folks it was a great weekend and a very successful shinsa. I am posting to=
 this forum for a piece of lost and found from the weekend. One of our cust=
omers in the shinsa room left behind a sword-bag and we fear it may have go=
t packed with someone else's case by mistake. If you were there saturday af=
ternoon and came home with an extra sword-bag do let us know.
	I will post =
a photo of a similar bag in the group galleries=85
-t
Thomas C Helm
www.tor=
yu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa
